titles.title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 7925 West Russell Road in Las Vegas, Nevada, as the "Private First Class Irving Joseph Schwartz Post Office Building".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.
Mr. Clay asked unanimous consent to discharge from committee and consider.
Committee on Oversight and Government discharged.

bill.summary:
9/8/2008--Introduced.
Designates the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 7925 West Russell Road in Las Vegas, Nevada, as the "Private First Class Irving Joseph Schwartz Post Office Building."
